Text:
**** DON'T BOTHER ****
When you try to run this version after rebooting, you get the message: "This version is not licensed. Please install a valid license key."

**** Found a fix ****

Upgraders remember to clear Windows XP:
C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\SlySoft\AnyDVD

Windows VISTA:
C:\Users\All Users\SlySoft\AnyDVD
C:\ProgramData\SlySoft\AnyDVD

Windows 7:
C:\Users\All Users\SlySoft\AnyDVD
C:\ProgramData\SlySoft\AnyDVD

after installing key
not working says it's for 21 days
and had no previous copy of this
If you get a license error just delete the contents of C:ProgramDataSlySoftAnyDVD and run activator again.

perfect app mate! top notch. If you experience problems with licence and registry just follow pauper01's advice as i did and delete :

Upgraders remember to clear Windows XP:
C:Documents and SettingsAll UsersApplication DataSlySoftAnyDVD

Windows VISTA:
C:UsersAll UsersSlySoftAnyDVD
C:ProgramDataSlySoftAnyDVD

Windows 7:
C:UsersAll UsersSlySoftAnyDVD
C:ProgramDataSlySoftAnyDVD

will seed for 7 days
